snippet: Mr. Volchok was a one-time theater manager and entertainment promoter who helped the Seattle franchise set attendance records and win an N.B.A. title.
abstract: Zollie Volchok, former general manager and president of the Seattle SuperSonics who popularized the team and led it to its only NBA championship, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Volchok was a one-time theater manager and entertainment promoter who helped the Seattle franchise set attendance records and win an N.B.A. title.

headline.seo: Zollie Volchok, 95, SuperSonics’ Showman President, Has Died
headline.main: Zollie Volchok, an N.B.A. Showman, Is Dead at 95
